Name: Forel Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Module (Active)

Resistance: -20%
Instability: +10%
Heat Generation: +15%
Signature Size: +20%
Duration: 90 seconds
Uses: 5

Shubin developed the Forel Module to temporarily distort a mining laser to produce a unique tremor. The resulting beam reduces a rock's resistance by 20%, but also increases the instability by 10%, making it easier but less stable and more dangerous to mine.
